content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron smelting setup at position x=-21.0 y=-50.0
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position x=-21.0 y=-50.0
- Stone furnace at position x=-15.0 y=-50.0
- Burner inserter at position x=-18.5 y=-48.5, which puts items into the burner mining drill
- Burner inserter at position x=-17.5 y=-46.5, which puts items into the burner mining drill
- Burner inserter at position x=-13.5 y=-49.5, which takes items out of the furnace

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move to the target location before placing entities. The maximum placement distance is 10 tiles.
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when trying to get an entity at a position where it does not exist
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
### Errors when inserting items when there are no items in the inventory
- Check if the item exists in the inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity.
### Errors when placing entities next to each other when there is already an entity
- Ensure that there is no entity at the target position before attempting to place a new entity next to another entity. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.

NAMESPACE
- No new utility functions have been defined.
- Important variables:
  - first_drill: BurnerMiningDrill
```
